main event: A teardrop-shaped object resembling the size of the moon was observed descending vertically below the horizon for three seconds.
interesting points: The object had a bright apple green color with a red tail., The sighting occurred at night, 25 degrees above the horizon., The sighting was determined to be caused by a meteor., The object was not identified as a balloon or aircraft., The observation lasted only three seconds.
sighted object: teardrop-shaped object with a red tail
